fleurs-cbd.sectionTitle: Our CBD Flowers: Nature, Aromas, and Relaxation
fleurs-cbd.descriptionPara1: Discover the authenticity and richness of our meticulously selected CBD flowers. Grown in Europe using respectful methods (Indoor 🏠, Greenhouse 🌿, Outdoor ☀️), our strains offer a diversity of aromatic profiles and CBD levels to meet every need. Whether you're looking to buy CBD flowers for deep evening relaxation or light daytime support, MonPlanCBD offers the best of nature.
fleurs-cbd.descriptionPara2: Each flower is carefully trimmed and cured to preserve its natural terpenes and cannabinoids. Browse our catalog to find the best CBD flower matching your preferences: fruity notes 🍓, earthy 🌲, woody, or spicy 🔥, we have the strain for you. All our flowers comply with the legal THC limit of less than 0.3%.
fleurs-cbd.benefitsItem1: ✨ Premium Quality: Rigorous selection of the best genetics and cultivation methods.
fleurs-cbd.benefitsItem2: 🔬 Independent Analysis: CBD and THC (<0.3%) levels verified by third-party labs.
fleurs-cbd.benefitsItem3: 👃 Aromatic Richness: Preserved terpene profiles for an optimal olfactory and taste experience.
fleurs-cbd.benefitsItem4: 🧘 Relaxing Effects: Ideal for relaxation, well-being, and daily stress management.
fleurs-cbd.benefitsItem5: 🌱 Guaranteed Traceability: Transparent origin and cultivation methods.
fleurs-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Flowers
fleurs-cbd.faq1Answer: CBD flowers can be consumed in several ways: in infusion (with a fatty substance), through vaporization (recommended method to preserve aromas and avoid combustion), or in cooking. Selling CBD flowers for smoking is prohibited in France.
fleurs-cbd.faq2Question: What are the effects of CBD flowers?
fleurs-cbd.faq2Answer: Effects vary depending on the strain and the individual but are generally associated with relaxation, muscle relief, mood improvement, and potential relief from stress and anxiety, without psychotropic effects.
fleurs-cbd.faq3Question: Which CBD flower should I choose?
fleurs-cbd.faq3Answer: The choice depends on your preferences (aromas, Indoor/Greenhouse/Outdoor cultivation) and the desired effect. Check our detailed descriptions or contact our customer service for personalized advice to find the best CBD flower for you.
fleurs-cbd.moreInfoText: Want to deepen your knowledge about hemp flowers and CBD?
fleurs-cbd.descriptionMetaTag: Discover our premium selection of CBD flowers: Indoor, Greenhouse & Outdoor. Unique aromas, natural relaxation. Lab-tested quality <0.3% THC | MonPlanCBD.

pollens-resines-hash-cbd.sectionTitle: CBD Resins & Pollens: Concentration and Intense Aromas
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.descriptionPara1: Explore the richness and potency of our CBD resins and pollens, concentrated products derived from the resinous trichomes of the hemp plant. Perfect for those seeking a more intense CBD experience or pronounced flavors, our selection includes various textures: from crumbly pollen 🍂 to more compact and malleable resins ✨, including modern extractions.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.descriptionPara2: Each CBD hash or pollen is carefully crafted to maximize cannabinoid concentration and preserve a rich terpene profile, ensuring deep aromas and potentially more pronounced effects. Ideal for vaporization or infusion (always with a fatty substance), it's an excellent alternative to diversify your CBD consumption. Naturally, all our products comply with the legal limit of 0.3% THC.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsTitle: The Advantages of Our CBD Resins and Pollens
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsItem1: ✨ High Concentration: High content of CBD and other cannabinoids for potentially enhanced effects.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsItem2: 👃 Intense Aromatic Profile: Rich in terpenes for powerful and complex flavors.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsItem3: 👐 Varied Textures: From light pollen to dense resins, choose based on your handling preferences.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsItem4: 🔬 Quality Controlled: Extracted from selected hemp plants and analyzed by independent laboratories.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.benefitsItem5: ⚖️ Legal Compliance: THC level always below 0.3% for worry-free consumption.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Resins and Pollens
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq1Question: What's the difference between CBD pollen and resin?
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq1Answer: Pollen (or skuff) is generally drier and more crumbly, collected by sifting trichomes. Resin (or hash) is often pressed (hot or cold) from pollen or trichomes, resulting in a more compact, sticky, or oily texture.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq2Question: How to use CBD resins and pollens?
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq2Answer: Temperature-controlled vaporization is the most recommended method to fully appreciate the aromas and effects. Infusion in a fatty substance (milk, oil) is also possible. Some also add them to cooking.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq3Question: Are CBD resins stronger than flowers?
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.faq3Answer: Generally yes, as they are concentrates of cannabinoids and terpenes. The CBD level is often higher than in flowers, which can lead to effects perceived as more intense. Always start with a small amount.
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.moreInfoText: Curious to learn more about extraction methods and the specifics of CBD concentrates?
pollens-resines-hash-cbd.descriptionMetaTag: Explore concentrated CBD resins & pollens. Potency, intense flavors & varied textures. Lab-guaranteed quality <0.3% THC | MonPlanCBD.

moonrocks-cbd.sectionTitle: CBD Moonrocks: The Ultimate Power Experience
moonrocks-cbd.descriptionPara1: Get ready to lift off to another dimension of relaxation with our CBD Moonrocks 🌠! Considered the caviar of CBD, Moonrocks are a unique creation: a premium CBD flower 🌿, generously coated in concentrated CBD oil or distillate 💧, then rolled in delicate pollen (kief) rich in cannabinoids and terpenes ✨. The result? A product of exceptional potency and extraordinary aromatic complexity.
moonrocks-cbd.descriptionPara2: CBD Moonrocks are aimed at experienced consumers seeking the most pronounced effects of CBD. Due to their dense and rich composition, they are ideal for moments of deep relaxation. We recommend gently crumbling them by hand (avoid grinders) and using them in vaporization or as a supplement in your infusions. Of course, our Moonrocks strictly adhere to the legal limit of 0.3% THC.
moonrocks-cbd.benefitsTitle: Why Fall for Our CBD Moonrocks?
moonrocks-cbd.benefitsItem1: 🚀 Maximum Potency: Combination of flower, oil, and pollen for a very high CBD concentration.
moonrocks-cbd.benefitsItem2: 🌌 Optimized Entourage Effect: Powerful synergy between various cannabinoids and terpenes.
moonrocks-cbd.benefitsItem3: 🤩 Unique Experience: Distinctive texture and appearance for an incomparable sensory discovery.
moonrocks-cbd.benefitsItem4: 👃 Complex Aromas: Fusion of the terpene profiles from the flower, oil, and pollen.
moonrocks-cbd.benefitsItem5: 💎 Exceptional Quality: Made from our best CBD ingredients and quality controlled.
moonrocks-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Moonrocks
moonrocks-cbd.faq1Question: What exactly is a CBD Moonrock?
moonrocks-cbd.faq1Answer: It's a "triple-layer" CBD product: a high-quality CBD flower is dipped or coated in a concentrated CBD extract (oil, distillate) and then completely covered in CBD pollen (kief).
moonrocks-cbd.faq2Question: How to consume a CBD Moonrock?
moonrocks-cbd.faq2Answer: Avoid grinding it as the oil will make it sticky. Gently crumble it by hand or with scissors. Vaporization is the ideal method to appreciate the flavors. You can also add small pieces to your infusions (with a fatty substance) or other preparations.
moonrocks-cbd.faq3Answer: Yes, due to their very high CBD concentration combining flower, oil, and pollen, the perceived effects can be significantly more intense than those of classic flowers or resins. It is advisable to start with a very small amount.
moonrocks-cbd.moreInfoText: Intrigued by these CBD nuggets? Discover more details about their creation and use.
moonrocks-cbd.descriptionMetaTag: The ultimate CBD experience: Discover our CBD Moonrocks! Flower + oil + pollen for unmatched power & aroma. Guaranteed <0.3% THC | MonPlanCBD.

huiles-cbd.sectionTitle: CBD Oils: Daily Well-being and Balance
huiles-cbd.descriptionPara1: Easily integrate the benefits of CBD into your routine with our range of high-quality CBD oils 💧. Designed for optimal sublingual absorption (under the tongue), our oils offer a practical and discreet method to enjoy cannabidiol. Each bottle comes with a dropper pipette for precise and personalized dosing.
huiles-cbd.descriptionPara2: We offer Full Spectrum CBD oils, containing all the cannabinoids (CBD, CBG, CBN...), terpenes, and flavonoids naturally present in hemp (THC < 0.3%), promoting the entourage effect. For those who prefer to avoid any trace of THC, our Broad Spectrum oils are ideal. Available in various concentrations (from 5% to 40% and more), you can choose the CBD oil best suited to your needs and sensitivity.
huiles-cbd.benefitsTitle: The Advantages of Our CBD Oils
huiles-cbd.benefitsItem1: ✅ Ease of Use: Precise dosing thanks to the dropper pipette.
huiles-cbd.benefitsItem2: ⚡ Rapid Absorption: The sublingual route allows for efficient cannabinoid absorption.
huiles-cbd.benefitsItem3: 🌿 Varied Spectrums: Choose between Full Spectrum (entourage effect) and Broad Spectrum (THC-free).
huiles-cbd.benefitsItem4: 📊 Multiple Concentrations: Adapt the potency of your CBD oil to your specific needs.
huiles-cbd.benefitsItem5: 🔬 Quality and Purity: Oils derived from supercritical CO2 or ethanol extractions, lab-tested.
huiles-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Oils
huiles-cbd.faq1Answer: Place the desired number of drops under your tongue using the pipette. Hold for 60 to 90 seconds before swallowing. This allows for direct absorption through the sublingual mucous membranes.
huiles-cbd.faq2Question: Which CBD oil concentration should I choose?
huiles-cbd.faq2Answer: It depends on your experience with CBD, your weight, and the desired effect. It is often advisable to start with a low concentration (5% or 10%) and gradually adjust the dose (number of drops) or concentration if necessary.
huiles-cbd.faq3Question: Full Spectrum or Broad Spectrum oil: what's the difference?
huiles-cbd.faq3Answer: Full Spectrum oil contains all hemp compounds, including traces of THC (<0.3%), which promotes the entourage effect (component synergy). Broad Spectrum oil also contains many cannabinoids and terpenes, but the THC has been removed.
huiles-cbd.moreInfoText: Need help choosing your oil or understanding dosages?
huiles-cbd.blogLinkText: Check out our complete CBD guides
huiles-cbd.descriptionMetaTag: Find your ideal CBD oil (5-40%) at MonPlanCBD. Full/Broad Spectrum for daily wellness. Precise dosage, fast sublingual absorption.

infusions-cbd.sectionTitle: CBD Infusions: Gentleness and Wellness to Sip
infusions-cbd.descriptionPara1: Savor a moment of calm and serenity with our selection of CBD infusions 🌱. Perfect for a relaxing break anytime during the day, our herbal teas combine the soothing benefits of CBD with the traditional virtues of other carefully selected plants (chamomile, verbena, mint...). A gentle and natural way to invite relaxation into your daily life.
infusions-cbd.descriptionPara2: Our CBD teas are prepared from quality hemp and natural ingredients. For optimal effectiveness, we recommend adding a fatty substance (like a touch of whole milk, coconut oil, or butter) to your hot infusion, as CBD is fat-soluble. Discover our blends designed for relaxation 💤, digestion, or simply for the pleasure of a comforting hot drink, always with less than 0.3% THC.
infusions-cbd.benefitsTitle: The Perks of Our CBD Infusions
infusions-cbd.benefitsItem1: 😌 Gentle Approach: A gradual and non-intimidating way to consume CBD.
infusions-cbd.benefitsItem2: ☕ Wellness Ritual: Turn your tea or herbal tea break into an enriched relaxation moment.
infusions-cbd.benefitsItem3: 🌿 Natural Synergy: Combination of CBD with other plants known for their beneficial properties.
infusions-cbd.benefitsItem4: 😋 Pleasant Flavors: Aromatic blends for an enjoyable tasting experience.
infusions-cbd.benefitsItem5: 💧 Hydration & CBD: Combine the benefits of hydration and cannabidiol.
infusions-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Infusions
infusions-cbd.faq1Question: Do I really need to add fat to my CBD infusion?
infusions-cbd.faq1Answer: Yes, it is highly recommended. CBD is not water-soluble but fat-soluble (liposoluble). Adding a fatty substance like milk, cream, coconut oil, or butter allows for better extraction and absorption of CBD by your body.
infusions-cbd.faq2Question: What are the effects of CBD tea?
infusions-cbd.faq2Answer: The effects are generally milder and appear more slowly than with sublingual oil, as the CBD passes through the digestive system. They are often described as promoting general relaxation, calmness, and well-being, enhanced by the other plants present.
infusions-cbd.faq3Question: When should I drink a CBD infusion?
infusions-cbd.faq3Answer: It depends on the blend and your needs. Some are ideal in the evening to promote relaxation before bed, while others can be enjoyed during the day for a relaxing break without marked drowsiness. Read the description of each infusion.
infusions-cbd.moreInfoText: Explore the different ways to prepare and enjoy your CBD beverages.
infusions-cbd.blogLinkText: Discover our tips on the Blog
infusions-cbd.descriptionMetaTag: Enjoy our CBD infusions & teas for a natural relaxation break. Organic blends with pleasant flavors. Wellness made easy to sip | MonPlanCBD.

soins-cbd.sectionTitle: CBD Care: Targeted Well-being for Body and Skin
soins-cbd.descriptionPara1: Give your body the attention it deserves with our range of CBD care products 🌿. Designed for local application, our balms, creams, and massage oils combine the soothing and potentially anti-inflammatory properties of CBD with nourishing natural ingredients. Ideal for skincare, muscle and joint comfort, or simply a moment of deep relaxation.
soins-cbd.descriptionPara2: Discover products like the CBD balm for targeted relief of tense areas, the moisturizing CBD cream to soothe sensitive or irritated skin, or the massage oil for optimal muscle relaxation. Our formulas are developed to penetrate quickly without leaving a greasy film, while respecting your skin and the legislation (THC < 0.3%).
soins-cbd.benefitsTitle: Discover the Benefits of Our CBD Care Products
soins-cbd.benefitsItem1: 🎯 Targeted Local Action: Apply directly to the concerned areas for a concentrated effect.
soins-cbd.benefitsItem2: 💧 Hydration & Soothing: Enriched formulas to nourish and calm the skin.
soins-cbd.benefitsItem3: 💪 Muscle & Joint Comfort: Ideal after exercise or to relieve daily tension.
soins-cbd.benefitsItem4: 🌿 Natural Ingredients: Combination of CBD with vegetable oils, butters, and plant extracts.
soins-cbd.benefitsItem5: 😌 Simple & Pleasant Application: Textures designed for easy use and a moment of well-being.
soins-cbd.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Body Care
soins-cbd.faq1Question: How do topical CBD products work?
soins-cbd.faq1Answer: Applied to the skin, CBD interacts with cannabinoid receptors present locally in the epidermis and underlying tissues. Unlike sublingual oils, it generally does not enter the bloodstream significantly, acting in a targeted manner.
soins-cbd.faq2Question: What are CBD care products suitable for?
soins-cbd.faq2Answer: They are popular for soothing localized muscle or joint pain, calming skin irritations (dryness, redness...), moisturizing the skin, or simply for a relaxing massage.
soins-cbd.faq3Question: Do CBD creams have psychotropic effects?
soins-cbd.faq3Answer: No. CBD itself is not psychotropic. Furthermore, topical application strongly limits the passage of CBD and other components (including traces of THC <0.3%) into the bloodstream, making any systemic or psychotropic effect improbable.
soins-cbd.moreInfoText: Learn more about the interaction between CBD and the skin and discover our care rituals.
soins-cbd.descriptionMetaTag: Discover our CBD care: balms, creams, massage oils. Targeted action for muscle/joint comfort & skin hydration | MonPlanCBD.

vaporisateur.sectionTitle: Vaporizers: The Modern and Healthy Method for CBD
vaporisateur.descriptionPara1: Optimize your CBD experience with our selection of high-performance vaporizers 💨. Vaporization is a modern consumption method that heats your CBD flowers 🌿 or resins ✨ to a precise temperature, without reaching combustion. This releases cannabinoids and terpenes as pure vapor, preserving delicate aromas and avoiding harmful byproducts associated with smoke.
vaporisateur.descriptionPara2: Whether you're looking for a portable vaporizer for discreet use on the go or a desktop model for longer sessions, we have the device for you. Choosing a CBD vaporizer means opting for better flavor rendition, more economical use of your products, and an approach considered healthier than traditional methods involving combustion.
vaporisateur.benefitsItem1: ✅ Combustion-Free: Avoids inhaling tars and toxins associated with smoke.
vaporisateur.benefitsItem2: 👃 Preserved Flavors: Faithful and pure rendition of the aromas and terpenes of your CBD products.
vaporisateur.benefitsItem3: ⚡ Increased Efficiency: Better bioavailability of cannabinoids compared to combustion.
vaporisateur.benefitsItem4: 💰 Economical: Optimized use of your CBD flowers and resins.
vaporisateur.benefitsItem5: 🌬️ Discreet: Less lingering odor than traditional smoke.
vaporisateur.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about CBD Vaporizers
vaporisateur.faq1Answer: A vaporizer heats plant material (flowers) or concentrates (resins) to a controlled temperature (usually between 160°C and 220°C / 320°F and 428°F). This heat releases the active compounds as vapor, which is then inhaled, without burning the material.
vaporisateur.faq2Question: What temperature should I use to vaporize CBD?
vaporisateur.faq2Answer: The ideal temperature varies depending on preferences and products. Lower temperatures (160-180°C / 320-356°F) favor flavors, while higher temperatures (190-210°C / 374-410°F) extract more cannabinoids for potentially stronger effects. Experiment to find your optimal setting.
vaporisateur.faq3Answer: Vaporization is widely considered a healthier alternative to combustion (smoking). By avoiding burning the material, it eliminates the creation and inhalation of many toxic and carcinogenic substances found in smoke.
vaporisateur.moreInfoText: Ready to switch to vaporization? Discover our tips for choosing and maintaining your device.
vaporisateur.descriptionMetaTag: Optimize your CBD experience with our vaporizers. Healthy, combustion-free method for flowers & resins. Pure flavors guaranteed | MonPlanCBD.

homepage.seoH1: Buy Premium Quality CBD in France 🇫🇷 - Flowers 🌿, Oils 💧, Resins ✨ | MonPlanCBD
homepage.heroSR: MonPlanCBD Special Offers ✨ and New CBD Arrivals 🎉
homepage.categoriesIntroText: Dive into the heart of our rigorously selected CBD ranges. Whether you're seeking the deep relaxation of a CBD flower 🌿, the precise concentration of a sublingual oil 💧, or the intensity of quality resin ✨, find the ideal CBD product to meet your expectations at MonPlanCBD. 🎯
homepage.whyChooseUsIntroText: At MonPlanCBD, your well-being and trust are at the core of our mission. ❤️ We are firmly committed to the impeccable quality of our products, the security of your transactions, and total transparency to guarantee you the best possible CBD experience. Discover the commitments that make us different! 👇
homepage.trustSignalLabTestedText: Every CBD product undergoes strict analysis by a certified, independent laboratory. We verify purity, cannabinoid concentration, and legal compliance ✅ (<0.3% THC). Certificates are available for absolute transparency. 📄
homepage.trustSignalSecurePaymentText: Shop for CBD with complete peace of mind. 🧘 Your bank transactions are encrypted and protected by our certified payment partner (PCI DSS), ensuring the confidentiality and security of your data. 💳
homepage.trustSignalFastDiscreetShippingText: Receive your CBD order within 24/48 working hours ⏱️ (mainland France). Your package is shipped in neutral packaging, without any logo or external mention, preserving your privacy. 🤫
homepage.trustSignalFrenchQualityText: We carefully select our partner growers and suppliers, mainly in France and Europe, for their expertise and adherence to standards. Complete traceability of our CBD products is ensured. 🌱➡️📦
homepage.trustSignalSupportText: Based in France 🇫🇷, our team of enthusiasts is available to advise you and answer all your questions about CBD, Monday to Friday, by email or phone. 📞📧
homepage.trustSignalLegalComplianceText: Our entire CBD catalog strictly complies with French and European legislation. All our products contain a THC level strictly below 0.3%, in accordance with the law. ⚖️
homepage.learnMoreAboutCommitmentsLink: Learn more about our quality commitments
homepage.learnMoreText: New to the world of CBD or a curious expert? 🤔 Our blog is full of useful information: buying guides 📖, usage tutorials 💡, cannabinoid breakdowns 🔬, news 📰, and much more to guide you.
homepage.noFeaturedProducts: Our popular products will be displayed soon. In the meantime, explore our categories! 👀
homepage.trustSignalLoyaltyText: Join our program and earn points 💯 with every purchase. Redeem your points for exclusive discounts 💰 on your next CBD orders.
homepage.trustSignalSatisfactionText: Your satisfaction is our priority. If a product doesn't meet your expectations, our team is here to find a solution with you (see conditions). 👍
homepage.featuredFlowersIntroText: Be captivated by our selection of premium CBD flowers. 💐 Carefully grown indoors 🏠, in greenhouses 🌿, or outdoors ☀️, our flowers offer a unique aromatic richness and authentic relaxing effects. Discover our most popular and appreciated strains. ✨
homepage.featuredHashsIntroText: Explore the concentration and potency of our CBD resins and pollens. 🍫 Crafted using traditional and modern methods, our CBD hash provides varied textures and intense terpene profiles for a profound CBD experience. Here are our current bestsellers. 🔥
homepage.featuredOilsIntroText: Integrate CBD wellness into your daily routine with our high-quality CBD oils. 💧 Available in Full Spectrum or Broad Spectrum and various concentrations, our sublingual oils are easy to dose and ideal for targeted support. Discover our favorite oils. ❤️
homepage.seoDescription: Buy premium lab-tested CBD in France at MonPlanCBD. Discover high-quality CBD flowers 🌿, oils 💧 & resins ✨. Fast, discreet shipping guaranteed.

cbdSection.title: What is CBD?
cbdSection.text: Cannabidiol (CBD) is a molecule found in hemp. CBD complements the spectrum of 110 other cannabinoids known to date. It is known for its wellness benefits for sleep, stress, anxiety, muscle tension, etc. It is available in the form of CBD balm, oil, or CBD flowers for infusion.

cbdPassion.imgAlt: CBD flowers with full spectrum oils and hemp seeds
cbdPassion.title: A Passion for CBD...
cbdPassion.text: My CBD Plan, it’s an idea that sprouted one winter afternoon at the Bistrot des Halles in Bayonne. Each of us has individually cultivated an interest in this plant, hemp. Whether for personal use, for our loved ones, or our community, we agree, like many others, that a promising future is shaping up around this plant, which has been used ancestrally around the world.

legalNotices.title: Legal Notices
legalNotices.p1: In accordance with Article 6 of Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004, for confidence in the digital economy, users of the website monplancbd.fr are informed of the identity of the various stakeholders involved in its creation and monitoring:
legalNotices.subtitle5: Hypertext Links and Use of Cookies
legalNotices.p2: The site monplancbd.fr contains a number of hypertext links to other sites, set up with the authorization of MONPLANCBD. However, MONPLANCBD does not have the ability to verify the content of the sites visited and will not assume any responsibility in this regard. Browsing the site monplancbd.fr may result in the installation of cookie(s) on the user's computer. A cookie is a small file that does not allow the identification of the user but records information relating to the navigation of a computer on a site. The data thus obtained is intended to facilitate subsequent navigation on the site and is also intended to allow various traffic measurements. Refusing to install a cookie may result in the impossibility of accessing certain services. The user can, however, configure their computer as follows, to refuse the installation of cookies: On Internet Explorer: tool tab (gear icon at the top right) / internet options. Click on Privacy and select Block all cookies. Confirm by clicking Ok. On Firefox: at the top of the browser window, click the Firefox button, then go to the Options tab. Click on the Privacy tab. Set the retention rules to: use custom settings for history. Finally, uncheck it to disable cookies. On Safari: Click at the top right of the browser on the menu icon (symbolized by a gear). Select Settings. Click on Show advanced settings. In the 'Privacy' section, click on Content settings. In the 'Cookies' section, you can block cookies. On Chrome: Click at the top right of the browser on the menu icon (symbolized by three horizontal lines). Select Settings. Click on Show advanced settings. In the 'Privacy' section, click on preferences. In the 'Privacy' tab, you can block cookies.
legalNotices.p3: In France, personal data is particularly protected by Law No. 78-87 of January 6, 1978, Law No. 2004-801 of August 6, 2004, Article L. 226-13 of the Penal Code, and the European Directive of October 24, 1995. When using the site monplancbd.fr, the following may be collected: the URL of the links through which the user accessed the site monplancbd.fr, the user's internet service provider, the user's Internet Protocol (IP) address. In any case, MONPLANCBD only collects personal information about the user for the need of certain services offered by the site monplancbd.fr. The user provides this information with full knowledge of the facts, especially when they enter it themselves. It is then specified to the user of the site monplancbd.fr whether or not they are required to provide this information. In accordance with the provisions of Articles 38 and following of Law 78-17 of January 6, 1978, relating to information technology, files, and freedoms, every user has the right to access, rectify, and oppose personal data concerning them, by making a written and signed request, accompanied by a copy of the identity document with the signature of the holder, specifying the address to which the response must be sent. No personal information of the user of the site monplancbd.fr is published without the user's knowledge, exchanged, transferred, assigned, or sold on any medium to third parties. Only in the event of the purchase of MONPLANCBD and its rights would the transmission of the said information to the potential buyer be allowed, who would in turn be bound by the same obligation to retain and modify the data with respect to the user of the site monplancbd.fr. The databases are protected by the provisions of the Law of July 1, 1998, transposing Directive 96/9 of March 11, 1996, on the legal protection of databases.

section1.title: 1. Introduction and Acceptance of Terms
section1.para1: Welcome to www.monplancbd.fr (the "Site"), published by MONPLANCBD SAS ("MonPlanCBD", "we", "us", "our"). These General Terms of Use ("ToU") govern your access to and use of the Site, including any content, functionality, and services offered on or through the Site.
section1.para2: Please read these ToU carefully before using the Site. By accessing, browsing, or using the Site in any manner, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all of these ToU and our {privacyPolicyLink}, which is incorporated herein by reference. If you do not agree to these ToU in their entirety, you must not access or use the Site.
section1.para3: These ToU constitute a legally binding agreement between you and MonPlanCBD.

section2.title: 2. Definitions
section2.intro: For the purposes of these ToU, the following terms shall have the meanings ascribed to them below:

site.label: "Site"
site.definition: Refers to the website accessible at the address www.monplancbd.fr and all of its pages, content, and features.

user.label: "User" or "You"
user.definition: Refers to any natural person accessing or using the Site, whether as a simple visitor or as a customer making a purchase.

monplancbd.label: "MonPlanCBD" or "Us"
monplancbd.definition: Refers to the company MONPLANCBD SAS, as identified in our {legalNoticesLink}.

product.label: "Product(s)"
product.definition: Refers to items based on Cannabidiol (CBD) and other related products offered for sale on the Site, in compliance with current French and European legislation.

content.label: "Content"
content.definition: Refers to all text, graphics, images, logos, icons, photographs, audio and video clips, data, software, and other elements present on the Site.

cgv.label: "T&Cs"
cgv.definition: Refers to our {cgvLink}, which specifically govern the purchase of Products on the Site.
cgv.cgvLinkText: General Terms and Conditions of Sale

cgu.label: "ToU"
cgu.definition: Refers to these General Terms of Use.

section3.title: 3. Site Access and Eligibility (Adult Users Only)
section3.para1: The Site and the Products offered are exclusively intended for persons aged 18 years or older. By accessing and using this Site, you represent and warrant that you are at least 18 years old and possess the full legal capacity to accept these ToU and, where applicable, to purchase our Products in accordance with our T&Cs.
section3.para2: MonPlanCBD does not knowingly collect information from individuals under the age of 18. If we learn that a minor has provided personal information or attempted to use the Site, we will take the necessary steps to delete such information and/or block access.
section3.para3: Access to the Site from territories where its content or the sale of Products is illegal is prohibited.

section4.title: 4. User Accounts
section4.para1: While browsing the Site may be possible without registration, placing an order requires providing necessary information, including an email address and a password. Completing the checkout process will automatically create a user account associated with the provided email address.
section4.para2: You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information as prompted during the checkout process. This information is necessary for processing your order and creating your account. Please refer to our {privacyPolicyLink} for details on how we collect and use your personal data.
section4.para3: You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the password associated with your account created during checkout and for restricting access to your computer or device. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password.
section4.para4: MonPlanCBD reserves the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, remove or edit content, or cancel orders in its sole discretion, particularly in case of violation of these Terms of Use or any applicable law.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.para1: All Content present on the Site, including, but not limited to, text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio and video clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the exclusive property of MonPlanCBD or its content suppliers and is protected by French and international copyright and intellectual property laws. The "MonPlanCBD" name and logo are registered trademarks belonging to MonPlanCBD SAS.
section5.para2: No element of the Site may be copied, reproduced, republished, uploaded, posted, transmitted, or distributed in any way without the prior written permission of MonPlanCBD. Any unauthorized use of the Site's Content constitutes infringement and may result in civil and/or criminal prosecution in accordance with Articles L.335-2 et seq. of the French Intellectual Property Code.
section5.para3: You are granted a limited license to access and make personal, non-commercial use of the Site.

section6.title: 6. Product Information and Important Warnings (CBD)
section6.intro: The Products offered on the Site contain Cannabidiol (CBD), a non-psychotropic cannabinoid derived from the hemp plant (*Cannabis Sativa L.*). It is essential that Users understand the nature of these Products and adhere to the following precautions for use:

subsection_compliance.title: Product Nature and Legal Compliance (THC < 0.3%)
subsection_compliance.para1: Our Products are carefully selected and comply with current French and European legislation. They contain a tetrahydrocannabinol (THC) level strictly below 0.3%, in accordance with regulations. These Products are not narcotics and do not cause psychotropic effects.
subsection_compliance.para2: We provide laboratory analysis certificates to attest to this compliance. It is the User's responsibility to ensure the legality of possessing and consuming CBD products in their country or region of residence if it differs from France.

subsection_no_medical_claims.title: Absence of Therapeutic Claims
subsection_no_medical_claims.para1: Products sold on this Site are not medicines and cannot under any circumstances be considered as such. They are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, mitigate, or prevent any disease. Information provided on the Site (blog, product descriptions, etc.) is for informational purposes only, based on public research and user feedback. It does not replace the advice of a qualified healthcare professional. MonPlanCBD makes no therapeutic claims regarding its Products.

subsection_usage_recommendations.title: Usage Recommendations (Infusion/Vaporization)
subsection_usage_recommendations.intro: For an optimal experience consistent with the nature of the Products:

item_flowers.label: Flowers and Resins/Pollens:
item_flowers.text: We recommend use via infusion (adding a fatty substance like whole milk, coconut oil, or butter for better cannabinoid assimilation) or via vaporization at a controlled temperature (typically between 160°C and 220°C) using a suitable vaporizer. Vaporization helps preserve the aromas (terpenes) and avoids harmful byproducts associated with combustion.

item_oils.label: CBD Oils:
item_oils.text: Our oils are designed for sublingual administration. Place the desired number of drops under the tongue, hold for 60 to 90 seconds before swallowing.

subsection_usage_recommendations.outro: Please follow any specific instructions provided on the Product packaging.

subsection_no_smoking.title: Prohibition of Smoking
subsection_no_smoking.para1: Our CBD flowers, resins, and pollens are absolutely not intended to be smoked. The combustion of plant matter, regardless of its type, generates toxic and harmful substances for health. MonPlanCBD disclaims all liability for the use of its Products via combustion (smoking).

item_medical.label: Medical Consultation:
item_medical.text: If you are undergoing medical treatment, suffer from specific health problems, or have any doubts, it is imperative to consult your doctor or a healthcare professional before consuming products containing CBD. CBD may interact with certain medications.

item_driving.label: Driving and Drowsiness:
item_driving.text: Although CBD is not psychotropic, it may cause a feeling of relaxation or drowsiness in some individuals. Do not drive or operate heavy machinery if you feel drowsy after consuming CBD. Adjust your consumption according to your sensitivity and planned activities.

item_pregnancy.label: Pregnancy and Breastfeeding:
item_pregnancy.text: As a precautionary measure, CBD consumption is strongly discouraged for pregnant or breastfeeding women due to the lack of sufficient studies on its potential effects.

item_minors.label: Minors:
item_minors.text: The sale and consumption of our Products are strictly prohibited to minors under 18 years of age.

subsection_variability.title: Variability of Effects
subsection_variability.para1: The effects experienced after consuming CBD can vary considerably from person to person depending on factors such as weight, metabolism, individual sensitivity, the dose consumed, and frequency of use. Always start with a low dose to assess your personal reaction.

section7.title: 7. User Conduct and Prohibited Uses
section7.intro: By using the Site, you agree not to:
section7.item1: Use the Site for any illegal, fraudulent, or unauthorized purpose under these ToU.
section7.item2: Violate any applicable law or regulation, including, but not limited to, those relating to the sale and consumption of CBD products.
section7.item3: Impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state your affiliation with a person or entity.
section7.item4: Upload, post, transmit, or disseminate any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, invasive of another's privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable.
section7.item5: Interfere with or disrupt the operation of the Site or the servers or networks connected to the Site, including by introducing viruses, worms, Trojan horses, or other malicious code.
section7.item6: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Site, other user accounts, or computer systems or networks connected to the Site.
section7.item7: Collect or store personal data about other users without their express consent.
section7.item8: Use the Site for commercial purposes without our prior written permission, including advertising or solicitation.
section7.item9: Use any robot, spider, or other automatic device, process, or means to access the Site for any purpose, including monitoring or copying any of the material on the Site (scraping).

section8.title: 8. User-Generated Content (Product Reviews)
section8.para1: If the Site allows you to submit content, such as reviews of Products ("User Content"), you remain solely responsible for that User Content.
section8.para2: By submitting User Content, you represent and warrant that:
section8.item1: You are the sole author and owner of the intellectual property rights thereto.
section8.item2: Your User Content is accurate and does not contain misleading information.
section8.item3: Your User Content does not violate any law, regulation, or third-party right (including copyright, trademark, privacy rights).
section8.item4_medical_claim: Your User Content contains no medical or therapeutic claims regarding the Products. Reviews should focus on personal experience (taste, aroma, appearance, customer service) and not on health effects.
section8.item5: Your User Content is not defamatory, hateful, discriminatory, threatening, or otherwise objectionable.
section8.para3: MonPlanCBD reserves the right (but has no obligation) to monitor, moderate, edit, or remove any User Content in its sole discretion, without notice, particularly if it deems that such content violates these ToU.
section8.para4: By submitting User Content, you grant MonPlanCBD a worldwide, perpetual, irrevocable, royalty-free, transferable, and sub-licensable license to use, copy, modify, delete in its entirety, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from, sell and/or distribute such content and/or incorporate such content into any form, medium, or technology without compensation to you.

section9.title: 9. Links to Third-Party Sites
section9.para1: The Site may contain links to websites or resources owned and operated by third parties. These links are provided solely for your convenience. MonPlanCBD has no control over the content, privacy policies, or practices of these third-party sites and assumes no responsibility for them.
section9.para2: The inclusion of links to third-party sites does not imply that MonPlanCBD endorses, guarantees, or recommends the services, information, content, or products offered by these sites.
section9.para3: You acknowledge and agree that MonPlanCBD is not responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods, or services available on or through any such third-party sites or resources. We encourage you to read the terms of use and privacy policies of any third-party website you visit.

section10.title: 10. Disclaimer of Warranties
section10.para1: THE SITE AND ITS CONTENT ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.
section10.para2: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMISSIBLE PURSUANT TO APPLICABLE LAW, MONPLANCBD DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
section10.para3: MONPLANCBD DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE SITE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, SECURE, OR ERROR-FREE, THAT DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED, OR THAT THE SITE OR THE SERVER THAT MAKES IT AVAILABLE ARE FREE OF VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS. MONPLANCBD DOES NOT WARRANT THE ACCURACY, COMPLETENESS, OR RELIABILITY OF THE SITE'S CONTENT OR THE RESULTS THAT MAY BE OBTAINED FROM USING THE SITE.

section11.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
section11.para1: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, IN NO EVENT SHALL MONPLANCBD, ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, OR AFFILIATES BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, EXEMPLARY, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES (INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, DATA, OR GOODWILL) ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO YOUR ACCESS TO OR USE OF, OR YOUR INABILITY TO ACCESS OR USE, THE SITE, CONTENT, OR PRODUCTS, EVEN IF MONPLANCBD HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
section11.para2: MONPLANCBD'S TOTAL LIABILITY TO YOU FOR ALL DAMAGES, LOSSES, AND CAUSES OF ACTION (WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR OTHERWISE) SHALL NOT EXCEED THE GREATER OF ONE HUNDRED EUROS (€100) OR THE AMOUNT YOU HAVE PAID TO MONPLANCBD, IF ANY, IN THE SIX (6) MONTHS PRIOR TO THE CLAIM GIVING RISE TO LIABILITY.
section11.para3: SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF CERTAIN WARRANTIES OR LIABILITIES. ACCORDINGLY, SOME OF THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. NOTHING IN THESE TOU AFFECTS YOUR STATUTORY RIGHTS AS A CONSUMER THAT CANNOT BE EXCLUDED OR LIMITED BY CONTRACT. NO PROVISION IN THESE TOU LIMITS OR EXCLUDES OUR LIABILITY FOR GROSS NEGLIGENCE, WILLFUL MISCONDUCT, DEATH, OR PERSONAL INJURY CAUSED BY OUR NEGLIGENCE.

section12.title: 12. Indemnification
section12.para1: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless MonPlanCBD, its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers from and against all losses, expenses, damages, and costs, including reasonable attorneys' fees, resulting from any violation of these ToU or any activity related to your account (including negligent or wrongful conduct) by you or any other person accessing the Site using your Internet account.

section13.title: 13. Privacy Policy and General Terms and Conditions of Sale
section13.para1: Your use of the Site is also governed by our {privacyPolicyLink}, which describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
section13.para2: All purchases of Products made through the Site are governed by our {cgvLink} (T&Cs).
section13.cgvLinkText: General Terms and Conditions of Sale
section13.para3: These ToU apply to the general use of the Site, while the T&Cs apply specifically to purchase transactions. In the event of a conflict between the ToU and the T&Cs regarding a purchase, the T&Cs shall prevail.

section14.title: 14. Modification of Terms of Use
section14.para1: MonPlanCBD reserves the right to modify or update these ToU at any time, in its sole discretion and without prior notice. Any changes will become effective immediately upon posting on the Site. The "Last Updated" date at the top of this page will indicate the effective date of the revisions.
section14.para2: We encourage you to review this page regularly to be aware of any changes. Your continued use of the Site after the posting of revised ToU constitutes your acceptance of those changes. If you do not agree to the new terms, you must stop using the Site.

section15.title: 15. Termination
section15.para1: MonPlanCBD may, in its sole discretion, suspend or terminate your access to all or part of the Site, with or without notice, for any reason, including, without limitation, breach of these ToU.
section15.para2: You may also stop using the Site at any time. Provisions of these ToU that by their nature should survive termination (including, but not limited to, provisions regarding intellectual property, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability) shall remain in effect after termination.

section16.title: 16. Applicable Law and Dispute Resolution
section16.para1: These ToU and your use of the Site shall be governed by and construed in accordance with French law, without regard to its conflict of law principles.
section16.para2: Any dispute or claim arising out of or relating to these ToU, the Site, or its use shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts of Bayonne, France.

section17.title: 17. Contact Us
section17.intro: If you have any questions regarding these Terms of Use, please contact us:
section17.postal_address: MONPLANCBD SAS, 2 place Elie Lambert, 64100 Bayonne, France.

section18.title: 18. Severability and Entire Agreement
section18.para1: If any provision of these ToU is found by a court of competent jurisdiction to be unlawful, void, or unenforceable, that provision shall be deemed severable from these ToU and shall not affect the validity and enforceability of the remaining provisions.
section18.para2: These ToU, together with the Privacy Policy and the T&Cs (for purchases), constitute the entire agreement between you and MonPlanCBD regarding your use of the Site and supersede all prior or contemporaneous agreements, whether written or oral, concerning such subject matter.

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.subtitle1: CBD : Le cannabidiol, qu’est-ce que c’est ?
FAQ.p1: Le cannabidiol (CBD) est une molécule présente dans le chanvre et complète le spectre des 110 autres cannabinoïdes connus à ce jour. On lui connaît des vertus bien-être pour le sommeil, le stress, l’anxiété, les tensions musculaires, etc. On le retrouve sous forme de baume, d’huile ou de fleurs à infuser.
FAQ.subtitle2: Comment connaître le taux de CBD/THC?
FAQ.p2: Il est tout naturel de vouloir connaître les taux de CBD ou de THC présents dans les fleurs et les huiles de chanvre que nous vous proposons. C’est pourquoi chaque étiquette produit se verra apposer un QR code qui vous redirigera vers l’analyse associée, répondant aux procédures requises par l’arrêté 2004-02-24 art. 3 JORF du 21 mars 2004.
FAQ.p3: Il n’y a pas une seule meilleure façon, tout simplement parce que chaque personne a un profil unique et particulier. La méthode la plus connue est l’infusion de la fleur de chanvre en incorporant un corps gras dans le mélange. Par exemple, vVous pouvez ajouter du beurre, de la crème ou encore de huile végétale (comme l’huile de coco) dans de l’eau frémissante à 90°C Laissez infuser 10 à 15 min. Servez.
FAQ.subtitle4: Puis-je me faire livrer du CBD à domicile ?
FAQ.p4: Si vous habitez dans l’une de ces villes (voir la carte), vous pourrez recevoir vos produits sous 24H. La qualité de service et d’information sont des critères essentiels pour Mon Plan CBD.  Pour cette raison, vous recevrez votre commande dans un conditionnement garantissant une conservation optimale afin de profiter au maximum des vertus bien-êtres recherchées.
FAQ.p5: Conformément à la loi en vigueur, nos produits ne sont pas destinés à la combustion. Il s’agit de respecter la méthode mentionnée plus haut, à savoir l’infusion avec un corps gras. Ne pas fumer, ne pas conduire après consommation, déconseillé pour la femme enceinte ou allaitante. Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus sur les conditions d’utilisation, veuillez cliquer ici. Nos produits ne sont ni des stupéfiants, ni des médicaments. Pour toute question, n’hésitez pas à nous joindre sur les réseaux sociaux ou par e-mail à l’adresse que vous trouverez dans la rubrique « Contact », en mentionnant votre demande en objet.

about.pageTitle: Our Story: The Passion for Quality CBD at MonPlanCBD
about.imageAlt: The landscape that inspired the brand

section1.title: The Spark: Our Origin Story
section1.para1: It all began not in a high-tech lab, but in the vibrant heart of the Basque Country, during a late winter afternoon at the Bistrot des Halles in Bayonne. Around a table, a lively conversation among passionate friends revealed a growing shared interest in an ancient plant with fascinating virtues: hemp, and more specifically, Cannabidiol (CBD).
section1.para2: Each of us had discovered CBD in our own way. For some, it was a personal quest for well-being, a natural means to find serenity and balance amidst daily stress. For others, it was the desire to help loved ones, to share a gentle alternative to soothe tensions or improve sleep. Whether in the form of oil, balm, or infusion, we were all convinced of the incredible potential of this molecule derived from hemp.
section1.para3: From this shared passion, a simple yet powerful idea was born: to create MonPlanCBD. Not just another online shop, but a trusted space, rooted in our values, where everyone could find exceptional CBD products, selected with the same rigor we would use for ourselves or our families.

section2.title: Our Commitment: Quality & Transparency
section2.intro: At MonPlanCBD, our mission goes beyond simple sales. We are driven by a deep conviction: wellness through CBD can only flourish on a foundation of **trust** and **quality**. That's why we are committed to clear and non-negotiable principles:

item1.label: Rigorous Selection:
item1.text: We search across Europe (prioritizing France whenever possible) to find partner producers who share our ethics: respectful cultivation (Indoor, Greenhouse, Outdoor), artisanal know-how, and adherence to the strictest standards. Every flower, every resin, every oil is chosen for its unique aromatic profile and wellness potential.

item2.label: Total Transparency:
item2.text: Trust is earned. That's why *every batch* of our products is systematically analyzed by an independent, certified third-party laboratory. We meticulously verify the cannabinoid concentration (CBD, CBG, CBN...) and ensure that the THC level always remains strictly below the French legal limit of 0.3%. These analysis certificates are available because your peace of mind is our priority.

item3.label: French Expertise & Traceability:
item3.text: Based in the Basque Country, we are proud of our local roots and our human-scale approach. We know our partners and track our products from cultivation to your doorstep, ensuring complete traceability.

item4.label: Personalized Support:
item4.text: The world of CBD can seem complex. Our team of enthusiasts, based in France, is here to listen, advise, and answer all your questions with kindness and expertise. Never hesitate to contact us.

section3.title: More Than Products: A Vision for Wellness
section3.para1: MonPlanCBD represents the desire to democratize access to superior quality CBD, legally and transparently. We believe in a holistic approach to well-being, where nature provides us with precious keys.
section3.para2: Whether you're a newcomer curious to explore the potential benefits of CBD for relaxation, sleep, or stress management, or a connoisseur seeking specific flavors and experiences, we are here to guide you.
section3.para3: Explore our different ranges – from flowers with captivating aromas to easy-to-dose oils, concentrated resins, and soothing care products – and find the 'CBD plan' that suits you.

cta.intro: Join the MonPlanCBD community and discover a natural, transparent, and high-quality approach to well-being.
cta.link3: Visit our Blog to learn more
